address_tag.description: address tag for from, to and cc headers (empty for disabling address untagging)

clean_text.description: clean text body on address tag removal

clean_html.description: clean html body on address tag removal

subject_tag.description: tag for subject header (empty for disabling subject untagging)

text_tag.description: name of annotation for tagging text body (empty for disabling text body untagging)

html_id.description: ID of html tag (empty for disabling html body untagging)

calendar_tag.description: calendar tag for organizer field (empty for disabling calendar untagging)
